elementor_default_generic_fonts.label: Default Generic Fonts
elementor_default_generic_fonts.description: The list of fonts used if the chosen font is not available.
elementor_default_generic_fonts.name: elementor_default_generic_fonts

elementor_global_image_lightbox.label: Image Lightbox
elementor_global_image_lightbox.description: Open all image links in a lightbox popup window. The lightbox will automatically work on any link that leads to an image file.
elementor_global_image_lightbox.name: elementor_global_image_lightbox

ui_theme.label: UI Theme
ui_theme.description: Set light or dark mode, or use Auto Detect to sync it with your OS setting.
ui_theme.name: ui_theme

edit_buttons.label: Editing Handles
edit_buttons.description: Show editing handles when hovering over the element edit button.
edit_buttons.name: edit_buttons
